name: MediaTrackSupportedConstraints.facingMode
description: The MediaTrackSupportedConstraints dictionary's facingMode property is a read-only Boolean value which is present (and set to true) in the object returned by MediaDevices.getSupportedConstraints() if and only if the user agent supports the facingMode constraint. If the constraint isn't supported, it's not included in the list, so this value will never be false.

refs.name: Media Capture and Streams
refs.description: The definition of 'facingMode' in the 'Media Capture and Streams' specification.
